login.title: Launching On The Outset of the UN Decade of Ecosystem Restoration.
acc.title: Setup Your Account
launch.title: Launch Your First Project
launch.desc: ORP provides the digital infrastructure for collecting, uploading, confirming, and visualizing reforestation data. ORP is an open-source and permissionless protocol for reforestation projects to transparently measure, report, and verify (MRV) the entire life cycle of their trees.
wizard.title: Launch a New Project
wizard.step1.creator: Add Funder
wizard.step1.input5.label: Funder Information
wizard.step3.tooltip.textarea: The more details you provide about your project, the better it is introduced to the community. Include tree species, suppliers, information about yourself and your team, etc.
wizard.step3.tooltip.files: Add supporting documentation on your project. Legal documentation on your rights to use the plot of land (i.e. rent agreement, legal ownership, local community permission, etc) will greatly boost your project launch and incentivise collateral providers’ and validators’ support and commitment.
wizard.step4.tooltip1: The cost of minting the NFT, a unique digital item in the blockchain that will represent the plot of land that will be reforested in your project.
wizard.step4.tooltip2: The amount of DAI to be locked o your wallet to start the project, which can later be used to cover the first stage report upload fee.
wizard.step4.tooltip3: The sum of Project Creation Cost and Project Deposit for covering the first stage report upload.
wizard.step4.tooltip4: The total amount to cover your Project Creation Costs and fee for report uploads during all stages of your project.
wizard.popup.title: Success!
wizard.popup.desc: Congratulations! Your project has been created successfully.
existing.title: Existing Projects
